infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos and videos to share with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to share photos and videos with friends.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio to share with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to save photos and videos to share with friends.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app uses the calendar to schedule events with friends.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app uses the contacts to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses the motion sensor to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses bluetooth to share events with friends.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses bluetooth to share events with friends.
